sourcesContent:
How it works

Reserve meals and make a difference


Get Started


Browse Meals

Find meals in your area

Use the search feature to locate restaurants offering surplus food near you.

Reserve a Meal

Choose from available options

Select a meal, reserve it for pickup at a specified time, and help reduce food waste.

Enjoy Your Meal

Nourish yourself and help others

Pickup your reserved meal and indulge in a delicious dining experience.

Rate and Review

Share your feedback

Provide ratings and reviews for the meals and the restaurants you visit.

Make a Difference

Fight against food waste

By using FoodSaver, restaurants contribute to reducing food waste and helping those in need.
